summary: This mod adds a book to leveled lists, and some dragon priests that once obtained, enables the player to see the location of Word Walls around the province of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
=====================
+++CURRENT VERSION+++
=====================

V1.1 - Added a SEPARATE version to use with Freedom of Speech Mod by Thomas Kaira (Check downloads section)
V1.0 - October 13th 2012

=================
+++Description+++
=================

This mod adds a book to leveled lists, and some dragon priests that once obtained, enables the player to see the location of Word Walls around the province of Skyrim.  This makes it easier to locate them. The book can be found randomly in the world, some (specifically two) of the dragon priests have it as well.

Please note! Some locations appear to be other location types on the map, but these places contain or are very close to the entrance of an actual Word Wall.

The spoiler section is at the bottom, if you can\'t find the book.
================
+++DOWNLOAD+++
================

Nexus - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25440/
Steam - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=102440770

==================
+++Requirements+++
==================

-IF you use the Freedom of Speech version of this mod, than obviously you need the Freedom of Speech mod, found here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24832
-Skyrim 1.7.7.0.6 or Later

==================
+++Installation+++
==================

Manual: Extract archive to Skyrim/Data folder. Click yes to Overwrite old files.
Automatic: Install with Nexus Mod Manager.

=======================
+++Upcoming Features+++
=======================

- Next: \"Dwemer Ruins of Skyrim\"

===================
+++Compatibility+++
===================

-Some leveled lists are changed.
-An interior cell is changed. See spoiler for more info.


================
+++Known Bugs+++
================

-I\'m expecting some heavy testing until I can say. I have found none yet.
Please point out any grammar, or spelling issues!

================
+++Change Log+++
================

V1.0 - Initial Release - October 13th 2012.

=============
+++Credits+++
=============

JustinOther
Every Endorser this mod attracts!
Bethesda for Skyrim and the CK,
And several quick commenters for my help pleas regarding Papyrus.
UESP Wiki.

Thanks to you all!

=============
+++Spoilers+++
=============
One book is located at High Hrothgar on the top of the bookshelf in the chamber to the left from the main entrance.
Another can be found on the remains of Krosis at Shearpoint.
author: iPalantir
